entry.name: Ability To Change Drift Direction
entry.comment:
Steering the kart while drifting affects the drift direction.
Game Version: 4.2 TCP Gecko Version: 2.53
Modes Supported: • Battle (Offline / Online) • Grand Prix • Time Trials • VS Race (Offline / Online)
Players Supported: • Wii U GamePad
Source: https://github.com/Mewtality/TCPGecko-MK8-Cheat-Codes

entry.name: Aimbot
entry.comment:
Automatically aim the nearest kart when enabled. Stop aiming by pressing the same activator button. Uppon activation, if players are too far away, the aim lock will fail.
⚠ Respawning or driving on anti-gravity will temporarily disable the Aimbot.
Info: Line 1 determines the activator value. (Default: 00001200) Line 2 determines the max distance of the nearest kart to search for. (Default: 43480000) Line 3 is the starting address of variables used by this code. (Default: 10014800)
Game Version: 4.2 TCP Gecko Version: 2.53
Modes Supported: • Battle (Offline / Online) • Grand Prix • Time Trials • VS Race (Offline / Online)
Players Supported: • Wii U GamePad
Toggler: • Select (-)
See Button Activators: https://pastebin.com/iYs6n7Sb
Default Data Used: 0x10014800 (12 bytes)
Source: https://github.com/Mewtality/TCPGecko-MK8-Cheat-Codes
